commandsExecutor

Class DifferentialDriveCommandsExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • commandsExecutor.DifferentialDriveCommandsExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommandsExecutor

    public class DifferentialDriveCommandsExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommandsExecutor
    Implementation of an ICommandExecutor for a IDifferentialDriveRobot.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

      • executeController

        public void executeController(java.lang.String cntType,
                     java.lang.String speed,
                     java.lang.String isForward)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: ICommandsExecutor
        Creates an ILineFollowerController and starts it. At the return from this method the robot should automaticaly follow the line on the ground.
        Specified by:
        executeController in interface ICommandsExecutor
        Parameters:
        cntType - type of the controller
        speed - default speed
        isForward - true if the robot moves forward
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
